org.jsapar.compose

Interface Composer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeanComposer, StringComposer, StringComposerNullOnEmptyCell, TextComposer

    public interface Composer
    Common interface for composer classes. A composer is able to take a Document or a sequence of Line and turn them into an output of some kind. The output type depends on the implementation of this interface.
    See Also:
    TextComposer, BeanComposer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void compose(Document document)
      This method composes some output based on an entire Document.
      default void compose(Iterator<Line> lineIterator)
      Composes all lines returned by the iterator.
      default void compose(java.util.stream.Stream<Line> lineStream)
      Composes all lines returned by the supplied stream.
      boolean composeLine(Line line)
      Composes output based on supplied Line, including line separator if applicable.
      void setErrorEventListener(ErrorEventListener errorListener)
      Sets an error event listener to this composer.

    • Method Detail

      • compose

        default void compose(Document document)
        This method composes some output based on an entire Document.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to compose output from.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - When a low level IO error occurs.

      • compose

        default void compose(Iterator<Line> lineIterator)
        Composes all lines returned by the iterator.
        Parameters:
        lineIterator - An iterator that iterates over a collection of lines. Can be used to build lines on-the-fly if you don't want to store them all in memory.

      • compose

        default void compose(java.util.stream.Stream<Line> lineStream)
        Composes all lines returned by the supplied stream.
        Parameters:
        lineStream - A stream of lines to compose

      • composeLine

        boolean composeLine(Line line)
        Composes output based on supplied Line, including line separator if applicable.
        Parameters:
        line - The line to compose
        Returns:
        True if the line was actually composed.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - When a low level IO error occurs.

      • setErrorEventListener

        void setErrorEventListener(ErrorEventListener errorListener)
        Sets an error event listener to this composer. If you want to add more than one error event listeners, use the MulticastErrorEventListener
        Parameters:
        errorListener - The error event listener to add.
